data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sartori, André F., Gargominy, Olivier, Fontaine, Benoît (2014): Radiation and decline of endodontid land snails in Makatea, French Polynesia. Zootaxa 3772 (1): 1-68, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3772.1.1
